channel.title: CVE Feed for Refuel -- autolabel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Refuel -- autolabel

item.title: CVE-2024-27321|2024-09-12T12:50:47.730Z -- refuel -- autolabel
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 0.0.8 and newer of the Refuel Autolabel library because of the way its multilabel classification tasks handle provided CSV files. If a user creates a multilabel classification task using a maliciously crafted CSV file containing Python code, the code will be passed to an eval function which executes it.

item.title: CVE-2024-27320|2024-09-12T12:49:43.930Z -- refuel -- autolabel
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 0.0.8 and newer of the Refuel Autolabel library because of the way its classification tasks handle provided CSV files. If a victim user creates a classification task using a maliciously crafted CSV file containing Python code, the code will be passed to an eval function which executes it.
